text:
The Beginning of IT world. Got Offer to take Computer Science which i never know what is it=D. I just know how to play console game on that time. Doesn't now what is the Programming is.
What i learn is :-

* Fundamentals of Computer Problem Solving : C++ Language
* Structured Programming : C++ Language
* Object Oriented Programming, Data Structure : Java Language
* Practical Approach of Operating Systems: Machine Language
* Introduction to Database Management System : MySQL, MSAccess
* Information System Development and Web Application Development : PHP, ASP
* Digital Electronic
* Interactive Multimedia: PhotoShop, Flash
title: Diploma in Computer Science

text:
Got Offer to take Computer Science Major for My Bachelor Program.
What i learn is :-

* Fundamentals of Computer Problem Solving: Java
* Principles of Operating Systems
* Object Oriented Programming and Data Structure : Java
* Database Management Systems : Oracle SQL
* Algorithm Analysis and Design
* Principles of Compilers
* Computer Security

Plus:- I involved several Programming Competition (ACM ICPC) , Hackhaton held by Dreamcatcher and MDec Training Assistant to assist the school teacher to teach their students about Scratch Programming
title: Bachelor in Computer Science Major

text:
The First Day Experience of Working Life in Enterprise Software House Company, Terato Tech Sdn Bhd. There is where i learn a lot :-

* Start using GIT in Intern Project
* Start to learn Android and Able to Keep Up fast because of Good understanding in Java and XML
title: Internship

text:
The Beginning of My Journey in Android Development after 6 Month Internship involving in the real project.

- Mobile Development
* Experience with Java for Android
* Familiar with Android Studio and Android SDK
* Have a good understanding with JSON and XML
* Familiar with RESTful web service
* Familiar with MVP and other Design patterns, RxJava, Retrofit, Dagger
* Be able to work well with both Material Design and Custom Layout
title: Android Developer

text:
- Mobile Development
* Experience with Android
* Familiar with Android Studio and Android SDK
* Have a good understanding with JSON and XML
* Familiar with Mobile Integration with RESTful Web Services
* Familiar with MVP Architecture, Dagger, Retrofit, Data Binding and Realm
* Be able to work well with both Material Design and Customized Layout
* Can follow the proposed design by the Mobile Designers

- Full Stack Development
* Familiar with Laravel Framework, Macro, Routing, Observers, Job Scheduling, etc..
* Familiar with MVC PHP CodeIgniter
* Familiar with Bootstrap Framework + Jquery
* Familiar with Restful Web Services API with Laravel Usually for Client / Mobile Integration
* Able to do PHP Unit Testing
* Payment Gateway API Integration like Billplz
title: Software Engineer
